Females: Permanent sterility and early menopause after >3.5 gy.
A smaller voxel volume will proportionally decrease signal to noise NEX = number of excitations; linearly related to time of acquisition I = intrinsic signal intensity of voxel, dependent on tissue composition and pulse sequence Water has a long T 2 relaxation time and therefore is hyperintense on T 2-weighted images.
